description:
syscall: fix SockaddrDatalink on netbsd

RawSockaddrDatalink and SockaddrDatalink need to match - make Data
have length 12 for both.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=697ca3c284e0 ***

syscall: fix SockaddrDatalink on netbsd

RawSockaddrDatalink and SockaddrDatalink need to match - make Data
have length 12 for both.

CC=golang-dev
